page.description: Sets an element to be disabled.

argument.name: valueOrId
argument.description: The ViewBox value, or an id specified using the syntax: #elementId.

argument.name: disabled
argument.description: true/false. If true, valueOrId will disabled. Otherwise, valueOrId will be enabled.

section.title: Example
